Registry of Open Data on AWS

3000 Rice Genomes Project

agriculture food security genetic genomic life sciences

Description

The 3000 Rice Genome Project is an international effort to sequence the genomes of 3,024 rice varieties from 89 countries.

Update Frequency

Not updated

License

This data is available for anyone to use under the terms of the Toronto Statement, which is available here

Documentation

https://docs.opendata.aws/3kricegenome/readme.html

Contact

http://iric.irri.org/contact-us

Usage Examples

Tools & Applications
  • RiceGalaxy by International Rice Research Institute
Publications
  • Tracking the origin of two genetic components associated with transposable element bursts in domesticated rice by Chen J et al (2019)
  • Structural variants in 3000 rice genomes by Fuentes RR et al (2019)
  • Rice Galaxy: an open resource for plant science by Juanillas V et al (2019)

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    http://s3.amazonaws.com/3kricegenome/README-snp_pipeline.txt
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::3kricegenome
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://3kricegenome/ --no-sign-request
